Features Demonstrated

  • Responsive 16:9 Aspect Ratio: Videos maintain proper proportions on all screen sizes
  • Lazy Loading: Video thumbnails are loaded only when they come into view
  • YouTube & Vimeo Support: Automatically detects and embeds videos from both platforms
  • Accessible Controls: Keyboard navigation support (Tab to focus, Enter/Space to play)
  • Loading States: Shows loading spinner while video loads
  • Error Handling: Graceful fallback when videos fail to load
  • Auto-generated Thumbnails: Fetches thumbnails from YouTube automatically
  • Placeholder Graphics: Beautiful fallback when thumbnails aren't available
  • Performance Optimized: Videos only load when user clicks play
  • Mobile Friendly: Touch-optimized controls and responsive design

Integration with Gallery

The video player component integrates seamlessly with the existing gallery system:

  • Maintains consistent styling with image thumbnails
  • Works with existing filter and search functionality
  • Supports the lightbox modal for fullscreen viewing
  • Preserves lazy loading performance benefits
  • Follows WCAG accessibility guidelines
